Question: Several of this person's buildings have been proposed by the United States to be UNESCO World Heritage sites.
Hints: They were overruled by this person, but the contractor secretly added extra steel to the horizontal concrete elements.
This person was born in the farming town of Richland Center, Wisconsin, United States, in 1867 and named Frank Lincoln ****.
Another son and architect, John Lloyd ****, invented Lincoln Logs in 1918, and practiced extensively in the San Diego area.
